channel.title: Kinda like muting? # ~ Need help ~ #
channel.description:
Hello, i was wondering if it is possible to mute in a certain area.
When i start off on my server - * Tutorial Island * - .. I want it so, when you use ::yell (MESSAGE) .. It sends a message to the person saying like "Complete tutorial island before using ::yell" Because people have been spamming etc..
Would really apreciate it. Thanks
EDIT: This looks like a request.. But thats not what im after.. I just want someone the point me in the right direction.

item.title: Kinda like muting? # ~ Need help ~ #

Bah 100 errors…

Anyone else?[br][size=1]Posted on: September 23, 2007, 09:30:41 AM[/size][hr]Cmon anyone?

item.title: Kinda like muting? # ~ Need help ~ #
item.dc:creator: @Sam_McKnight Sam McKnight
item.description:
@Sam_McKnight wrote:

add:

public int DoneTI;

Under:

public class client extends Player implements Runnable {

replace your yell with mine:

if (command.startsWith("yell")) { // Mr McKnight's rewite of ::yell. if(DoneTI = 0) sendMessage("You must compelete tutorial island before using this command."); else PlayerHandler.messageToAll = playerName+": "+command.substring(5); } }

Then at the bit when they leave the isle, add this in there:

if(DoneTI = 1)

–Note this is just a thorey, it may not work. BACK UP YOUR SERVER –

Read full topic
